filters.name: Purge
filters.desc: Deletes the selected mob from the Selection Box

filters.name: Fill Dispensers Filter
filters.desc: Original Filter by Sethbling. Modified to support Droppers

filters.name: Presistence Filter
filters.desc: Removes all entities in selection box

filters.name: Rename Tiles Filter
filters.desc: Renames all Tile Entities in the Selection Box

filters.name: Add Vines Filter
filters.desc: Add Vines to the sides of blocks

filters.name: Schematic To Script Filter
filters.desc: Converts the Selection box into Python Code for filters.

filters.name: Set Block Data
filters.desc: Changes the Data Value of the choosen block in the Selection Box
